sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Act of Privy Council in favours of the clerks of kirk-sessions, and other church-officers of the regular established clergie. Edinburgh, the first day of December, 1687. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1687.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Signed at end: Extracted forth of the records of his Majesties Privy Council, by me Sir William Paterson knight and baronet, clerk of his Majesties most honourable Privy Council. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
Act of Privy Council in favours of the clerks of kirk-sessions, and other church-officers of the regular established clergie. Edinburgh, the first day of December, 1687. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1687.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Signed at end: Extracted forth of the records of his Majesties Privy Council, by me Sir William Paterson knight and baronet, clerk of his Majesties most honourable Privy Council. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
his most sacred Majesty
the heir of Andrew Anderson
